DOC.brief_summary: Planned Parenthood Federation America 's ( PPFA ) Medical Affairs Division conduct prospective , cluster randomize trial determine factor influence acquisition second third human papillomavirus ( HPV ) vaccine dose among young woman age 19 26 . This descriptive interventional study provide data assess impact computerized tool upon HPV vaccine series completion . The interventional aspect study include determination patient assistance provider support program applicable woman 's situation well implementation computer software system customize patient reminder .
DOC.brief_title: Innovative Tool Increase Completion Human Papillomavirus ( HPV ) Vaccine Series
